first_para: Paul Wheelhouse (born 22 June 1970) is a Scottish politician and the Minister for Community Safety and Legal Affairs in the Scottish Government. He is the Scottish National Party Member of the Scottish Parliament representing the South Scotland region.

full.extract:
Paul Wheelhouse (born 22 June 1970) is a Scottish politician and the Minister for Community Safety and Legal Affairs in the Scottish Government. He is the Scottish National Party Member of the Scottish Parliament representing the South Scotland region.
^ "The Scottish Parliament – Current Members – Paul Wheelhouse". Scottish Parliament. Retrieved 21 December 2014.
full.title: Paul Wheelhouse
